data.title: Shareholders
data.text:
Information for shareholders

IAG shares are traded on the London Stock Exchange and on the stock exchanges of Madrid, Barcelona, Bilbao and Valencia, through the Spanish Stock Exchanges Interconnection System (Mercado Continuo Espa√±ol).

IAG shares traded on the London Stock Exchange are held electronically as share entitlements. These are in the form of Crest Depository Interests (CDIs). The CDI holder is the beneficial owner of the shares.

IAG has partnered with Computershare to administer the electronic share register through the Corporate Sponsored Nominee service with no cost to the shareholder. As IAG is a Spanish company, holding shares this way allows shareholders to continue to have the beneficial entitlement of their holding. This not only gives them the ability to trade shares in IAG but gives them the same entitlements as a direct shareholding, such as voting rights and attendance at shareholder meetings.

In addition, IAG has a Sponsored Level 1 American Depositary Receipt (ADR) facility that trades on the OTC market in the US (see www.otcmarkets.com). Deutsche Bank is the ADR depositary bank.

Contact us

For enquiries relating to institutional investors please contact the Investor Relations team:

Email: [email protected]

For enquiries relating to individual shareholders:

United Kingdom

Please contact Computershare for all matters relating to a UK shareholding. They administer name and address changes, registration of legal documents and the transfer of shares.

You can contact them via the following channels:

Tel: +44 (0)370 702 0110 (Mon-Fri 08:30-17:30)

Email: [email protected]

Sign up for e-comms where you can manage your account online at www.investorcentre.co.uk/iag

Alternatively, you can contact Shareholder Services directly via [email protected]

Spain

If you hold your shares through the Spanish register please direct your query to:

Email: [email protected]

Tel: +34 915 878 974 (Monday-Friday between 09:00 to 16:00 (CEST))

USA

American Depositary Receipts (ADRs)

If you hold your IAG shareholding in the form of ADRs, please direct your queries to Deutsche Bank who are the

ADR Depositary Bank.

Toll free: +1 800 301 3517

International: +1 718 921 8137

Email queries: [email protected]
